params._duration: The duration of the proposal in days (e.g. 7 -> 7 days).

params._proposalId: The ID of the proposal to execute.

getActiveProposals().details: Returns an array of active proposals.

getExecutedProposals().details: Returns an array of executed proposals.

getFailedProposals().details: Returns an array of failed proposals.

getIsProposalHasPassed(uint256).details: Returns whether a specific proposal has passed.

params._proposalId: The ID of the proposal to check.

getProposalDetail(uint256).details: Returns the details of a specific proposal.

params._proposalId: The ID of the proposal to retrieve.

getTotalProposalsCount().details: Returns the total number of proposals.

params._proposalId: The ID of the proposal to vote on.
params._support: Whether the vote is in support (true) or against (false) the proposal.
